name: places/ChIJzU0nIsq0RIYR696ZzdSPCQY
formattedAddress: 504 E 88th St, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 504 E 88th St, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text:
Ever since I started working with Alexa from Loken Careers, I have not stopped singing her praises.  When I reached out to Loken Careers, I felt completely lost and directionless when it came to my career -  up to this point I’ve had a very non-traditional career journey from public health to service industry to coaching and facilitation.  Having said that, I had no idea which strengths and skills to highlight while job searching or how to even approach the job search to begin with.  In just a couple of sessions with Alexa, I got not only absolute clarity on my strengths and skills and how I can apply them in my job search but also a clear blueprint for how to search jobs in a way that doesn’t feel soul-sucking.  Alexa gave me so many amazing resources (her podcast is invaluable!) as well as guidance regarding specific job fields I have not previously considered.  She has also helped me expand my network by helping set up informational interviews with professionals in different fields (this has been SO useful).

I also have to say that Alexa is so incredibly kind and empathetic, and I am so grateful for how empowered she helped me feel at a time when I was at a real low.  She truly listens and hears you, which is crucial.  Finally, her rates are beyond reasonable.

I have already recommended Loken careers to so many friends and family, and will no doubt work with her in the future when I need interview + negotiation prep and resume editing.

Thank you so much Alexa !!!

originalText.text: Alexa has been such a blessing during my career search. I came to her feeling demoralized and frustrated by my entire job search and she gave me hope and clarity that have re-energized my hunt. One of the most caring, gracious, patient, and positive people I have had the pleasure of working with.

text.text: Alexa has been such a blessing during my career search. I came to her feeling demoralized and frustrated by my entire job search and she gave me hope and clarity that have re-energized my hunt. One of the most caring, gracious, patient, and positive people I have had the pleasure of working with.

originalText.text:
Alexa is amazing! I first met with her in 2018 when I had moved to a new city and needed some hand-holding as I searched for a new job. She helped me with crafting an updated resume, updating my professional social account, and creating a killer cover letter template. With Alexa's encouragement, my self confidence increased and within no time I had landed a great new gig and even negotiated my salary. About a year and a half later, I realized I wanted to take a new direction with my career, and again I turned to Alexa for guidance. She helped me to identify aspects of my previous jobs that I loved and ones I didn't care for, and expanded my knowledge about what was out there that would be a good fit for me. I ended up finding a job I truly love that combines my greatest professional strengths. I cannot recommend Alexa and Loken Careers more to anyone who is struggling with finding their "calling" or just looking for a better situation.

Pro tip: do the homework! ;)

originalText.text: I can't express enough how grateful I am for Loken Careers! Lauren was such a HUGE help in helping me create a new, from scratch, as well as a cover letter. She then helped me with searching for jobs and what to look for when searching. The best part of it, is that their pricing is very reasonable! Very grateful for this company.

originalText.text:
I had been using the same old resume for years, and I’ve been struggling to find a job for months! Working with Julia at Loken Careers was such a game changer. I was blown away by her level of expertise and attention to detail that she put into creating my new resume. Julia was incredibly helpful and supportive throughout the entire process, and she took the time to understand my career goals and aspirations. Thanks to Julia, I eventually landed a great job that I absolutely love!

I highly recommend Julia and Loken Careers to anyone who is serious about advancing their career.
